posts.post_content:
Posted By: Richard
Greetings Folks,

   It's been a few months now since I've managed to add to my C46 Toronto team set.  Any chance anyone out there has any of the following cards available for sale?  

I don't want anything super high grade, just something presentable without any major creasing or serious paper loss, if possible.

Please email me at richard@richardarmstrong.ca, with scans and asking prices.

Here's what I am still looking for:

C462Jim McGinley
C4627Joe Kelley

Thanks in advance!

Regards,

Richard.

Edited to reflect 1 pickup so far.  Thanks Dan!
Edited to reflect another pickup.  Thanks Bill!
Edited to reflect another pickup.  Thanks Mike!

(Also removed references to T212 Victoria cards; gonna stick with the C46s only)

Posted By: Brian C.
Hi, please email me at briansandy3@msn.com re T212s. Brian

Posted By: Richard
Brian -- email sent.

Posted By: Richard
Friendly bump from the second page.

I've picked up 2 C46s so far, but have a bit left in my PayPal account.  Anyone out there have a McGinley or Delehanty they'd be willing to deal?  If it's a type in your collection, I'd be more than willing to buy you a replacement type.

Thanks guys!

Richard.

Posted By: Richard
One last bump.  Anywhere out there have a McGinley availble?

Regards,

Richard.
